overview: The fifth installment of the Avatar franchise.
title: Avatar 5

overview: In the house he sleeps in, a boy see's a black casket his family refuses to explain. Instead of staying silent, the boy kept asking. The casket mysteriously opens one night, a lady emerges, and his cries for help go unanswered. Never Ask About The Black Casket, Because The Lady inside of it could come out.
title: The Black Casket

overview: The fourth installment of the Avatar franchise.
title: Avatar 4

overview: In 2142, seven neuroscience engineers are brought onboard the largest man-made spacecraft as part of a newly opened research division. When a containment breach places the station into quarantine, the walls of reality and humanity's future are in jeopardy.
title: the SPIRE.

overview: In Waiting for Magic, the isolated villagers of Taourirt prepare for the Muslim Conclave of the Nine—a secretive ritual held once a generation to commune with the Bean Sídhe (banshee), a spirit said to guard the island from ruin. The conclave’s purpose: to select a new Guardian who will bear the banshee’s curse, ensuring the village’s survival. But this year, eerie omens disrupt the ritual—a phantom wail echoes nightly, crops wither, and villagers vanish into the bog.
title: Waiting for Magic

overview: During a plague's reign of terror, a devout figure and an ambiguous stranger set out to trade supplies for an alleged cure in a nearby village, an odyssey which will take them deep into their own souls.
title: Cold Game

overview: In the 18th Century, A slave, never given a last name, Marcellus is freed. But he has hasn't forgiven them for the years of dehumanizing and unpaid and unthanked service, but now he's freed he makes the most of life, but only for a year, when he realises his men are popping up, seemingly trying to kill him, but he tries to ignores them, but than they take his mother, and he goes back to kill them and save her
title: Marcellus

overview: Follow the early days of Dick Grayson and Jason Todd and explore how their friendship becomes tested by their diverging ideas for what their future should be.
title: Dynamic Duo

original_title: Welcome To The End Of The World
overview: After a violent assault on his sister and family, He plans to track each of the attackers down and take revenge which leads through an underground world of depravity and crime.
title: Welcome To The End Of The World

original_title: The Cold Awake: The Last Pulse
overview: In the winter, a plane crashes into a family's field. Unknown liquid spills in the plane, infecting people onBoard. people get loose and infect whoever gets in their way.
title: The Cold Awake: The Last Pulse

overview: After witnessing the murder of his own mother by his father's hands, Jester McCulley attempts to regain a sense of a normal life while battling with his inner desires and an unsettling past.
title: The Devil’s Disguise

overview: A Superhero on the verge of his deepest darkest secret, the fact that he was a German solider in World War II, Eighty years previously being exposed scrambles to get the evidence eradicated as The Grandchild of a family who's lives were ended by the superhero tries to get the evidence out, as quick as possible, and a movie actress works as a spy to collect more evidence against the superhero
title: The Hero's Exposé

overview: A great actor, but terrible man with a struggling acting career finds hope and love, and his career takes off, he becomes a better person. A terrible actor but a great man sacrifices everything he cares about and all the morals he's ever sworn to uphold in the pursuit of greatness. But when the now great man with a great career takes all the parts he wants, he takes his career into his own hands
title: Split Screen

overview: A group of notorious criminals, all going by animal code names: leader 'Snake'; his friendly but bitterly incompetent brother 'Dog'; the brains, 'Lion'; third wheel 'Tiger'; sidekick 'Wolf'; and the violent 'Bear'. But one day, Tiger is killed by a simple gunshot. As the crew investigates, they discover one of their own may be a cop. As members are picked off one by one, the notorious crime group may finally be brought down by the law.
title: Inside Job

overview: A group of notorious criminals, made of six members, all going by animal code names. Leader 'Snake'  his friendly, but bitterly incompetent brother 'Dog', brains 'Lion', third wheel 'Tiger' side-kick 'Wolf' and overly violent 'Bear' but one day Tiger is killed with a simple gunshot. They dig around and find that one of their members is cop, and as more members are picked off, it seems like the notorious crime group may finally be bested by the cops
title: Inside Job

overview: In dreams, Anthony is a villager who enjoys a fruitful lifestyle, helping his neighbourhood and creating unique friendships with the townsfolk. When he suddenly sees his long lost biological parents in one of his dreams, he journeys through his subconscious in an attempt to find them and potentially reconnect. However, throughout his journey, he crosses from his own dreamworld into an astral plane, of which he cannot return from.
title: Esther's Comet

overview: Max Anderson (Tony Traylor) is your average city guy committing to his everyday life working at the Unruled Corporation. One day, not only does he meet a newcomer at the company, Michelle Jenkins (Rachel Lee), but he also accidentally stumbles into Ryan Collins (Gamebox), a person who acts and even dresses similarly to him. The two guys don't get along quite well, and as a result, they get tangled up in the middle of a very discretely secret propaganda led by the corporation's boss Jonathan Davis (RedRageKnight) as they end up lost far from home. Now, it is up for the two guys to find a way to get back to Crateville before it's too late.
title: Guys

overview: Two twins live in isolation, hiding a dark secret, until hunger reveals that danger was always on the other side of the mirror.

overview: Described as a stand-alone adventure that takes roughly five years after the events of The Rise of Skywalker.

overview: A live-action adaptation of the Legend of Zelda video game series.

overview: A runaway couple takes on a journey of love, subconsciousness, and remorse; while believing that a homeless gay man is God.

original_title: Dorian Gray, ou Narciso Através do Espelho
overview: Dorian Gray is but a boy, yet he's worshipped as a God - by the closeted painter who immortalized his beauty, by the libertine who taught him all of the world's secret pleasures, and by himself. For the next one hundred years, Dorian Gray falls into a rabbit-hole of debauchery, remaining forever young while his portrait pays the price for each of his sins. But when crimes of decades past come back to haunt him, and the novelty of everlasting youth starts taking its toll, can his soul still be redeemed?
title: Dorian Gray, or Narcissus Through the Looking Glass

overview: A struggling writer is tortured by visions of his own work.
title: The Stars That Fade

overview: The Revenge: Part Two, planning to release in 2027, plunges into the heart of a conflict no one saw coming. What began with whispers of revenge has erupted into all-out war, where alliances crumble and enemies strike from every side. In the chaos, old secrets resurface, forcing those who once fought from the shadows onto the battlefield.  With trust shattered and survival uncertain, revenge becomes the only compass — but in a war fueled by betrayal, who can you trust when the dust settles?  The battle has begun, but the truth is far from over.
title: The Revenge: Part Two

overview: The third installment in The Angry Birds Movie franchise. Plot TBA.

overview: The live-action retelling of the hit film "The Prince Of Egypt"

overview: Described as "a non-prequel non-reboot sequel part two but with reboot elements franchise expansion film". Plot TBA.

overview: Blackwater, a down-on-his-luck farmhand, is poached by a notorious snack mogul and brought to work in the city. Though their company thrives under the new regime, Blackwater begins to fall deeper into the business lifestyle, running the risk of losing the man he used to be.
title: Blackwater

overview: The long-awaited third and final installment of The Grooks trilogy.

overview: A workaholic gets a second chance at love when 3 ghosts take him on a trip through his past, present, and future romantic endeavors, forcing him to face his fears and win back the woman he lost before Christmas is over.
title: A Gift Wrapped in Time

overview: A psychotic killer takes it upon himself to decide who is “naughty” or “nice”
title: The Naughty List

overview: Michael Jackson, now a world-saving hero and musical icon, finds himself adrift after the chaos of the Spotlight Seven. Haunted by fame and fractured family ties, Michael embarks on a personal journey to reunite the Jackson Five—his brothers, his roots, and the harmony he lost. But the path to healing is far from simple. As old tensions resurface and new wounds emerge, Michael must navigate the complex legacy of his past while staying true to the joy that first ignited his voice.  Set against the backdrop of forgotten towns and abandoned recording studios, Michael reconnects with each of his brothers in a heartfelt odyssey across America. With Brad and Samantha by his side, and Goku occasionally crashing in with unsolicited wisdom, Michael learns that sometimes saving the world starts with saving your family.  Stripped of supervillains and secret councils, Michael discovers that history isn’t just what you’ve lived through—it’s what you choose to remember, reclaim, and rewrite in song.
title: Best Of Joy: Chapter 2 - History

overview: The fifth film in the Shrek franchise. Plot TBA.

overview: Madison's hopeless lesbian crush on her straight and taken roommate takes a dark turn when she learns of an arcane recipe for a love potion - one that calls for her own bones.

overview: Alexandria Wright meets Elijah Martinez and the demonic journey begins. Elijah Martinez finds himself ensnared in a romantic involvement with Alexandria Wright, an unfaithful Covert Narcissist. She convinces him they are soulmates and they take a vow before God for His blessing with the penalty of betrayal being death. After years pass, Alexandria forgets the vows and begins cheating behind Elijah's back. Just a week before Christmas, she abruptly betrays him. To his astonishment, she swiftly transitions to a new relationship, bringing with her the unsettling secret of transmitting an incurable sexually transmitted disease to her new partner. Then came Karma. Her victims arrive to spit on her dirty grave as her demise finally arrives.
title: Duped (The Jezbel Experience)

overview: Sequel to Jumanji: The Next Level. Plot TBA
title: Jumanji 4

overview: The sequel to the 2022 film. Plot TBA.

overview: When a killer realizes he's trapped in a loop of killing, dying and coming back to life, he seeks to find the one person who must die to end the cycle.
title: The Hourglass

overview: The young children, Digory and Polly, accidentally unleash the malevolent White Witch onto an unsuspecting 20th century London. Will be an adaptation of the C.S. Lewis novel of the same name, and the first in a series of Netflix adaptations of the Narnia book series.
title: The Magicians Nephew

overview: SIMULACRA is a film adaptation of Kaigan Games’ 2017 hit phone-horror game of the same title. A man finds a phone in his doorstep, and as he searches through it to find the owner, he learns the dark truth behind her disappearance.

overview: The fourth installment in the franchise. Plot TBA.

original_title: The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping
overview: Return to the world of Panem 24 years before the events of The Hunger Games for the reaping of the 50th Hunger Games, also known as the Second Quarter Quell.
title: The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping

original_title: Three Bags Full: A Sheep Detective Movie
overview: George Hardy, a shepherd who loves his sheep and raises them only for their wool. Every night he reads aloud a murder mystery, pretending his sheep can understand, never suspecting that not only can they understand, but they argue for hours afterwards about whodunnit. When George is found dead under mysterious circumstances, the sheep realise at once that it was a murder and think they know everything about how to go about solving it. The local cop Tim Derry, on the other hand, has never solved a serious crime in his life, so the sheep conclude they will have to solve it themselves, even if it means leaving their meadow for the first time and facing the fact that the human world isn’t as simple as it appears in books.
title: Three Bags Full: A Sheep Detective Movie

overview: Marcus James Studios' 11th Film Follows After The Events Of The Short Film Called "Christmas Scissors 2"
title: Christmas Scissors: The Movie

overview: Dean Carter's mind unravels while deciphering the mystery behind the disappearance of his fiancé.

overview: After a late-night slasher screening, a group of horror-loving friends find themselves trapped in a terrifying game where slasher movie rules become reality. As eerie events unfold, they realize someone is rewriting the genre—forcing them to fight for survival in a film that’s still being written. The only way out? Break the rules before it’s too late.
title: REEL

original_title: The Doctor Will See You Now
overview: the doctor will see you now
title: The Doctor Will See You Now

overview: After making a deal with the devil, an isolated and unsatisfied professor uses supernatural means to achieve success and happiness at the cost of his soul.
title: Faust

overview: When New York architect Tate Donovan arrives in Cape Cod to design his best friend’s summer home, he is hoping to make a fresh start. Recently discharged from an upscale psychiatric facility where he was treated for acute depression, he is still wrestling with the pain of losing his beloved sister. Her deathbed revelation—that she can see spirits who are still tethered to the living world, a gift that runs in their family—sits uneasily with Tate, who struggles to believe in more than what reason can explain. But when he takes up residence at a historic bed-and-breakfast on the Cape, he encounters a beautiful young woman named Wren who will challenge every assumption he has about his logical and controlled world.
title: Remain

original_title: The Legend of Aang: The Last Airbender
overview: Taking place years after the events of Avatar: The Last Airbender, the film will follow the series' main cast in their young adult years.

overview: The residents of Mossy Bottom Farm looking forward to Halloween – until the clumsy Farmer trashes the flock’s beloved pumpkin patch! When Shaun turns mad scientist to fix the problem, things rapidly spiral out of control. With the Farmer missing and a wild beast roaming the woods of Mossingham, all the ingredients are in place for a monstrously fun family adventure.
title: Shaun the Sheep: The Beast of Mossy Bottom

overview: A North Korean girl escapes her country to start a new life in France. However, things don't go as expected. She is mentally sick.

overview: Almost two decades after crashing down to Earth, Prince Adam is whisked back across space to defend his home planet of Eternia against the evil forces of Skeletor. But to defeat such a powerful villain, Prince Adam will first need to uncover the mysteries of his past and become He-Man: the most powerful man in the Universe.
title: Masters of the Universe

overview: Indy and Finn are best friends who escape into the forest to create a fantasy film filled with heroes, monsters, and wooden swords. As they immerse themselves in their imaginary world, the real world quietly encroaches, Finn is moving away, and neither boy knows how to say goodbye.  Their playful filmmaking project becomes a means of clinging to a fleeting connection. Through toy knights, hand-drawn monsters, and whispered arguments, the boys wrestle with the inevitable changes that come with growing up.
title: Finn

overview: Redmond, who was raised intensely Catholic, struggles to cope with the loss of his religion  throughout different stages of life, constantly seeking penitential fire through masochistic means.

overview: As Riley trying to have a great summer, upon killers killing her friends that get in there way. She stumbles trying her best to survive.
title: Slasher Summer

overview: The movie follows an unnamed internet hitman who, after one of his previous victims comes back to life, locks himself in his bathroom with a gun with one bullet to get away from the corpse that is outside his bathroom door that is banging on the door trying to get in! As time goes by he slowly starts going insane and starts talking to himself in one sided conversation while having weird dreams that seem to predict the future, he receives dog food and phone calls from a strange man with unexplained knowledge about everything named Mr. E, who discusses topics of morality, philosophy, and mysterious, all-powerful them, while asking to be let into the house!
title: The Hinge

overview: The Mandalorian, a lone bounty hunter, is tasked with capturing Grogu, a mysterious and adorable creature. Instead, he forms a strong bond with Grogu and strives to protect him from various threats, exploring his evolving purpose in a post-Empire galaxy.
title: The Mandalorian and Grogu

overview: Jake Bishop has been an exemplary Executive Protection Medic with a distinguished career but life hasn't always been that way for him. There have been miscues, failures, wrong turns and one day he just decides to walk away from it all. His ex boss wants to hire him for one final mission together and when Jake senses redemption for all life's twist and turns, will they survive and can the thought of love save him just in time from a path of destruction. Only time will tell.
title: A Guardian's Heart

overview: Tyler Edward's first feature film. A Horror/Sci-Fi that follows journalist Nicki Quinn as she documents a married couple’s monumental extra-terrestrial science experiment.

overview: After her parents' death, Lily moves into the vacation home they left for her and discovers she's far from alone.

overview: A suburban housewife embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue her captured husband so he isn't late for dinner.

overview: After a local woman is murdered and martyrized for being queer, a lesbian couple discusses their own fears.

overview: Two animals become unlikely friends.

overview: After the death of his fiance, Cara, Wyatt, an emotionally explosive young man, struggles to cope with his grief and growing resentment for his reserved friend and roommate, Matt, who’s struggling with demons of his own. While Wyatt wallows in his self-loathing at the burial, he is approached by the cryptic Mysterious Man. Who offers him friendship and a chance to bring Cara back through a ritual. As tensions between Wyatt and Matt escalate, and his knowledge of the ritual expands. Wyatt learns the dark cost of what the ritual entails…
title: UNTIL NEXT TIME

overview: After the death of his fiance, Cara, Wyatt, an emotionally explosive young man, struggles to cope with his grief and growing resentment for his reserved friend and roommate, Matt, who’s struggling with demons of his own. While Wyatt wallows in his self-loathing at the burial, he is approached by the cryptic Mysterious Man. Who offers him friendship and a chance to bring Cara back through a ritual. overview: The sequel to the 2019 film. Plot TBA.

overview: A new movie based on the world of Super Mario Bros. that further broadens Mario's world with a bright and fun story. Plot TBA.

overview: In the wake of a traumatic incident at a funeral, an aging widow is faced with a bizarre, impossible choice.
title: Resurrection

overview: In Indiana, a group of pro-life terrorist lure vulnerable young women into a trap. Which one will escape? Which one will be blessed?
title: Blessed: Live, Laugh,Run!

overview: Soon after the Thompson family’s arrival in the countryside, the three children – Beth, Joe, and Fran – discover a magical tree and its extraordinary and eccentric residents, including Moonface, Silky, Dame Washalot, and Saucepan Man. At the top of the tree, they are transported to spectacular and fantastical lands and, through the joys and challenges of their adventures, the Thompsons learn to reconnect and value each other for the first time in years.
title: The Magic Faraway Tree

overview: A scorned student uses AI to spread a rumor about their ex-situationship, leading to unintended consequences.
title: SPECIOUS

overview: A lone astronaut wakes up on a spaceship with no memory of his mission. As he pieces together his past, he discovers he's humanity's last hope against an extinction-level threat, leading to an unexpected yet crucial alliance.
title: Project Hail Mary

overview: Glimmer, an aspiring performance artist, debuts her one woman show: "Glimmer - One Last Shine!" However, something about this show isn't quite right as her audience is forced to watch as Glimmer's sanity slowly unravels.
title: Glimmer

overview: A family in the '80s start to notice bizarre happenings in their neighborhood.
title: Flowervale Street

overview: In the 1930s, a lonely Frankenstein travels to Chicago to seek the aid of a Dr. Euphronius in creating a companion for himself. The two reinvigorate a murdered young woman and the Bride is born. She is beyond what either of them intended, igniting a combustible romance, the attention of the police and a wild and radical social movement.
title: The Bride!

overview: Animal lover Mabel uses clever new technology designed to "hop" human consciousness into lifelike robotic animals to communicate with beavers, uncovering mysteries within the animal world beyond anything she could have imagined.
title: Hoppers

overview: The world turns upside down for the peasant girl Giselle when she discovers her lover Albrecht is actually a nobleman promised to another. In despair, she kills herself. Her spirit joins the Wilis, the vengeful ghosts of women who have been jilted and die before their wedding day. The Wilis are hell-bent on killing any man who crosses their path in a dance to the death. Wracked with guilt, Albrecht visits Giselle’s grave, where he must face the Wilis – and Giselle’s ghost. Will he survive?
title: Royal Ballet & Opera 2025/26: Giselle

overview: This experimental short film is an adaptation of the fictional main character’s diary entry. This diary, belonging to a transgender woman named Valeria, deals with personal and existential anxieties about her body.
title: The Diary of Valeria

overview: Timid nine year old Sasha teams up with his beloved family dog Charlie, who gets abducted by aliens and returns with superpowers, to thwart a plan by the neighbour's sinister cat Puddy to destroy humanity.
title: Charlie the Wonderdog

overview: In the near future a new drug outlawed by the government called time that once taken makes you immortal but the catch is every time you die you go back to the same spot you were killed but on the same day you took the drug. We follow Curio a mysterious loner that has to complete a mission no matter how many times he dies.
title: The cycle

overview: Warsaw, December 13, 1981. Martial law shuts down the country. Overnight, a country turns into a prison. Taxis have been replaced by tanks. Citizens are treated like criminals. And visiting British Professor Joan Andrews finds herself trapped. After witnessing the murder of a young student by the secret police (the "Crows"), Joan herself becomes the target.
title: Winter of the Crow

overview: The Cat takes on his toughest assignment yet… to cheer a pair of siblings struggling with their move to a new town.
title: The Cat in the Hat

overview: The seventh installment in the 'Scream' franchise. Plot TBA.
title: Scream 7

overview: A fat white cat named "Tubby Wubby" goes on a adventure to stop a evil kitten "Skinny Stabley".
title: Tubby Wubby

overview: We follow TALENSSS, the disgusting diva sweet transvestite from transexual Carcaixent during one of the most difficult stages of her shitty life.
title: TALENSSS and The Angry Inch

overview: At the end of a lovely wedding rehearsal, the Maid of Honor gives a speech in a last-ditch attempt to win the love of the bride.
title: Bitters

overview: Two opposing hired guns meet on a job and inevitably fall in love.
title: LOVE HURTS (really, really bad)

overview: Christian, a young man overlooked by society, burdened by a dark past and escalating madness, finds himself trapped in a world of violence and despair.
title: Confidential

overview: An upcoming Short Film written and directed by Matthew Cancilla
title: Celluloid

overview: It takes a minute to find a special person and a entire lifetime to forget them. After a rescue mission gone wrong, a firefighter connects with a super natural visitor while rehabilitating at a sanitarium and is transported through time to find the only thing saving his soul, is his realization of true love.
title: Fate

overview: In the last remaining state of North America as of 2041, a hired killer is given a chance at escape by a local crime boss in the city of Altaledo, the last bastion of the Americas now jostling for life under a firm rule of corporate governance and totalitarian control.
title: Headcrackin'

overview: Will, a small goat with big dreams gets a once-in-a-lifetime shot to join the pros and play roarball – a high-intensity, co-ed, full-contact sport dominated by the fastest, fiercest animals in the world. Will’s new teammates aren’t thrilled about having a little goat on their roster, but Will is determined to revolutionize the sport and prove once and for all that "smalls can ball!"
title: GOAT

overview: Grieving the loss of his parents, a teenage humpback whale must embrace his destiny and discover his mystical song to save the oceans from a terrible monster.
title: The Last Whale Singer

overview: Set in NYC, the musically driven comedy centers on Pierre, born as a product of forbidden love between a hawk and a pigeon. Pierre is rejected by both communities. Tired of not fitting in, Pierre sets out on a mission to discover where he truly belongs.
title: Pierre the Pigeon-Hawk

overview: In the aftermath of her friend's passing, an artist processes her grief by making a film. She weaves her personal archival footage and an unfinished science-fiction narrative into a deeply raw and emotive work of art.
title: Elegy to a Missing Friend

overview: Adam is a man who can’t feel any emotion whatsoever. When his doctor advises him experimental treatment, he sends over his nursing assistant to help him. But, that night, an intruder breaks in and says that his only goal is to make Adam feel every emotion. The catch? With 10 violent “acts” that will gradually build up to his possible death.
title: Declan Sennott’s Intrusion

original_title: R.E.M. X Buster Keaton's Sherlock Jr.
overview: Buster Keaton’s Sherlock Jr. with R.E.M.’s Monster Adventures in Hi Fi- A Silents Synced Film— originated in Austin—soon out into the world!
title: R.E.M. X Buster Keaton's Sherlock Jr.

overview: Spanning multiple generations and continents, Starlight follows the poignant journeys of four main characters as they traverse the bittersweet chapters of their lives, culminating in their ultimate struggles to overcome overwhelming obstacles relating to cancer. Yet, the heart of the film lies beyond the disease itself; it is a narrative of hope celebrating the power and perseverance of the human spirit, embodied and personified by these characters and their ability to triumph spectacularly against all odds.
title: Starlight

overview: An enchanting retelling of the classic fairy tale, this family comedy entwines themes of love and friendship. A fan of the local superstar Prince Merliflore, Cinderella is dying to attend the ball, where he will be choosing a bride. Instead, she’s stuck at home performing house chores ordered by her wicked Stepmother.
title: Three Wishes of Cinderella

original_title: BORN SEXY YESTERDAY: Decoding the Enigma of Beauty
overview: October 1, 1985. The chilling emptiness in Michele Avila's eyes. Her murder, a savage ballet of teenage fury, ripped through the town, festering wounds exposing the venomous underbelly of a seemingly innocent friendship. Jealousy, a serpent coiled in the heart of adolescence, struck with the force of a viper, revealing the terrifying depths of envy's reach. These weren't just girls; they were predators.  Women are born with many layers, a mix between good and evil. Out of all the positive tropes that can validate the existence of women, why is it that "Born Sexy Yesterday" is a trope that resonates with our male counterparts the most?
title: BORN SEXY YESTERDAY: Decoding the Enigma of Beauty

overview: After a number of strange disappearances have been reported in the area, Andrew and Jason, two brothers who received a drone for graduation, decide to film around their town to learn more about them, but then become distracted by a new girl in school who lives nearby. The two boys devise a plan to sneak their drone through an open window of her home, only to discover a terrible, dark secret.
title: Inside That House

overview: Four down-on-their-luck friends in Nairobi attempt an absurd and chaotic heist on a bank truck, but their lack of experience and endless blunders turn the high-stakes operation into a hilarious disaster that puts their friendship to the ultimate test.
title: AMATEUR HAWA

overview: A beautiful steamboat gets into a crash with a mouse aboard. After the crash, the mouse turns into a killer. Watch as your pal takes a dark turn through a creepy forest, killing people.
title: Meanboat

overview: After an incident where Jayden spills coke on his friends' new shirt, he loses it. Ethan declares war on his old best friend,  and it gets quite serious.
title: Civil War

overview: After a plane crash strands a capable female employee and her annoying boss on a remote island, she must use her survival skills to keep them both alive, despite their challenging relationship.
title: Send Help

overview: A filmmaker learns that the process of making is the story they’ve been searching for.
title: A Blank Frame

overview: Julie, devestated after the passing of her best friend Matt, struggles to navigate a world ready to forget him.
title: Lost in Tomorrow

overview: When a mysterious letter calls James back to Silent Hill in search of his one truelove, he finds a once-recognizable town transformed by an unknown evil. As James descends deeper into the darkness, he encounters terrifying figures both familiar and new and begins to question his own sanity as he struggles to make sense of reality and hold on long enough to save his lost love.
title: Return to Silent Hill

original_title: Snoopy's Big City Adventure: A Peanuts Movie
overview: Snoopy, Charlie Brown and the rest of the Peanuts gang embark on an epic adventure to the Big City, learning the true meaning of friendship, while meeting some surprising new friends along the way.
title: Snoopy's Big City Adventure: A Peanuts Movie

overview: A disgraced local TV news reporter enlists the help of a wannabe journalist and a career film student to produce a documentary to revive his career.
title: B-Roll

overview: After a team of Miami cops discovers millions in cash inside a derelict stash house, trust frays as everything — and everyone — is called into question.
title: The Rip

overview: A meditative collection of 12 four-minute short films, capturing nature in its purest form. An experimental project inspired by Abbas Kiarostami’s ‘24 Frames’.
title: Take 12

original_title: 28 Years Later Part 2: The Bone Temple
overview: The second installment in the 28 Days Later sequel trilogy. Plot TBA.
title: 28 Years Later Part 2: The Bone Temple

overview: Man obsessed with mathematics and odds finds a secret formula to life and safety.
title: Mr Calculator

overview: Opal struggles to balance her personal problems.
title: The Bootstrap Paradox

overview: A young priest visits a convent in Mumbai where a brutal exorcism has failed—what he finds inside is not just a demon, but a mirror to his own darkest desires.
title: Xarax

overview: A new young man is accepted into a college campus, making new friends and meeting new people. Including a girl, who he falls in love with, but slowly begins to psychologically and psychedelically torment his first night of college, as he later becomes obsessed into something way darker.
title: SHE.

original_title: Black Men in Uniform: The Untold Story
overview: Pata Seca  (1828), a man whose back bore the whip marks of his enslavers , whose eyes held the haunted memory of being forced to breed over 200 slave children in order to sustain his master’s plantation.  Men broken but unbowed, transformed from field hands into soldiers from the civil war to Vietnam.  This documentary weaves together authentic narratives from the 1800s, accompanied by original images and footage, highlighting the significant influence that Black men in uniform had in Hollywood and addressing ongoing relevant issues to date.
title: Black Men in Uniform

overview: HELLO EVERYONE ON THAT BEAUTIFUL NIGHT
title: Late night TV Show

overview: A psychological odyssey-like telling of the year 2025, that takes you on a roller coaster full of emotion, excitement and adventure documented by Joesiah Garcia. Including anthology films written and directed by the closest friends of the director.
title: EXOUSIA

overview: On his final night in Chicago, a young actor, with the help of his twin sister, says his goodbye to the first city he called home.
title: Doomsday

overview: Two lumberman meet in a bar to discuss their violent shared history, the morning after the eruption of Mt. St. Helens in 1980.
title: Saint Helens

overview: On his final night in Chicago, a young actor, with the help of his twin sister, says his goodbye to the first city he called home.
title: Doomsday

overview: Two lumberman meet in a bar to discuss their violent shared history, the morning after the eruption of Mt. St. Helens in 1980.
title: Saint Helens

overview: The two adult kids of an alcoholic retired Navy Officer, maneuver their way through his funeral preparations and grief, by trying to put his unfinished last beer in the coffin, so he won't get sober in the afterlife.
title: Angel

overview: Three friends go for a night on the town in order to help their friend get over what seemed to be the perfect relationship.
title: Hoodie

overview: A fading actress and her A-List husband confront the realities of their relationship after a recent tragedy.
title: Headlines

overview: Eliana's neighbour always keeps the top light on, the white glow spills right into her backyard, and she can see everything. So when her neighbour hangs a disturbing flag in the window in clear view of her children, she feels compelled to call the police.
title: no worries, mate

overview: In a decade long feat, the crew of "Lizard Boy" chart their journey from Seattle to Off-Broadway while discussing what it takes to make a musical worthy of the New York stage and beyond.
title: Dragons In Seattle

overview: A man and woman spend time with each other in their apartment. Presented as ten vignettes.
title: A Couple Lives Together

overview: A young woman, Alicia, finds herself entrapped within a non-linear purgatory, moving against unknown fates of life and death. To escape, she must physically and emotionally progress through realms both familiar and foreign, plagued with faces both old and new, while reliving a life she may no longer desire.
title: Deep-Eyed

overview: A bustling and average police precinct is disrupted when a frantic teenager enters with a huge problem.
title: Ratols & Ransom

overview: Based loosely on the life of Saint Francis of Assisi, Francis follows a young woman's grief-driven spiral into opioid abuse and piety.
title: Francis

overview: Disgraced journalist Jayne Baghurst seeks to re-establish herself in London through the support of her daughter Robin, after being served with divorce papers from her husband. While Jayne attempts to force her once-obliging spouse to take on the substantial debt she has accrued during their year of separation, Robin begins to see the social contracts underlying her family relationships for what they are.
title: Cost of Living

overview: This story is a coming-of-age film in the mind of a teenager named 'Manny'. We see him go through teenagehood with his decisions. We see Manny go down the rough, sad and happy patches in his life. He has also fallen in love with his best friend's girlfriend and has to choose between true love or Friendship
title: Solitude in my Mind

overview: Electronics lecturer, Cam Cameron, attempts to survive on the UK's most remote island, Rockall, for a record 50 days to prove his strength to himself and inspire his family.
title: The Edge of Existence

overview: Untitled project in production by I29 Entertainment
title: Untitled I29 Entertainment Western

overview: This short film adaptation of Edgar Allan Poe's famous short story follows the events of a killer reminiscing on the murderous deed he committed.
title: The Tell-Tale Heart

overview: As the fear of her impending adulthood becomes louder, a sedentary girl is asked to go to a party.
title: Glint

overview: A man acquires an artificially intelligent android to cope with the loss of his recently deceased wife, but in an attempt to create a truly sentient partner, he inadvertently turns a harmless lovebot into a deadly soulmate.
title: SOULM8TE

overview: A Second Shot at love comes sooner than expected for a young widow and widower who meet the day of their spouses' funerals.
title: Too Soon

overview: Mr. and Mrs. Twit are the meanest, smelliest, nastiest people in the world who also happen to own and operate the most disgusting, most dangerous, most idiotic amusement park in the world, Twitlandia. But when the Twits rise to power in their town, two brave orphans and a family of magical animals are forced to become as tricky as the Twits in order to save the city.
title: The Twits

overview: A fantasy/science-fiction/sword'n'sorcery film from director John Carl Buechler. Shot in 2013 and still unreleased, this is a follow up to Trolls.
title: Wizardream

overview: On April 13, 2029, the asteroid Apophis will pass close enough to Earth, it will be below our satellites. It will dip below and pop back out.
title: Apophis 2029

overview: A group of friends sets out on a holiday road trip to Greece. On their way south, they are intercepted by a group of Croatian gangsters. Locked in a remote house, they find themselves struggling for their lives.
title: Someone Dies Tonight

overview: Looking to rebuild their relationship, Emma and Ben find themselves terrorized by what hides inside them.
title: What Hides in Us

overview: Two down-on-their-luck musicians form a Neil Diamond tribute band to follow their dreams and prove that it's never too late to find love.
title: Song Sung Blue

overview: After successfully rebuilding his empire, Max Bavington has one last shot at British societal success. He politely borrows a girl, praying she will complete one final test to hopefully, save Poshington once and for all. But be warned, the nightmare may just have begun.
title: Poshington: The Last Hurrah

overview: An animated holiday movie based on Winnie the Pooh.
title: A Hundred Acre Christmas

overview: Marty Mauser, a young man with a dream no one respects, goes to hell and back in pursuit of greatness.
title: Marty Supreme

overview: A young detective is tasked with solving the brutal murder of a powerful mayor. As he uncovers the city’s dark secrets, the case consumes him, testing his morals and driving him to the brink of insanity. With his relationships unraveling, he must confront a truth that could destroy him.
title: Nocturne

overview: A group of friends facing mid-life crises head to the rainforest with the intention of remaking their favorite movie from their youth, only to find themselves in a fight for their lives against natural disasters, giant snakes and violent criminals.
title: Anaconda

original_title: The Model, The Mannequin, and Me
overview: A government experiment becomes a designer's nightmare when a pair of military-issue mannequins show up at his place of business for their daily use, despite their deadly programming.
title: The Model, The Mannequin, and Me

overview: Millie is a struggling woman who is relieved to get a fresh start as a housemaid to Nina and Andrew, an upscale, wealthy couple. She soon learns that the family’s secrets are far more dangerous than her own.
title: The Housemaid

overview: Set just days before Christmas, Big Worm is a story about a newly located Nigerian/Canadian family in Australia. The film is narrated by high school student Yemi, who in her teenage lamentation over Australia’s lack of “Christmas Spirit,” recounts mystical occurrences throughout her childhood.
title: Big Worm

overview: In the early 1990s in West Texas, three ambitious young men begin their ascent to notoriety within their small town crime organization as they navigate the treacherous underworld of drugs, gambling, and illicit deals. Their rise to power brings both wealth and danger, testing their bonds and morality in a world where trust is fragile and betrayal is commonplace.
title: Los Vaqueros

overview: Jake is at the end of his adventure to find his sister but from the guilt of his actions Jake will half to accept the past and move on  to be able to find his sister.
title: Stone Sword 3 BattleGround

overview: Following the death of half of the global population by a virus, a scientist has introduced a new form of life: the Mnemonix.
title: Mnemonix

overview: After a scary diagnosis, Richelle decided it was time to see the world - as well as her online friends - before it's too late.
title: Richelle's World Tour

overview: A young man tries to get away with a bagful of cash.
title: A Thurles Tale

overview: A group of five find themselves trapped somewhere with no light, no way out, and no memory of their former lives. With no way out, the group tries to figure out who could've done this to them and what it takes to escape the inescapable.
title: Quintet

overview: Before kings and empires feared him, a tyrant sought to erase him. A newborn child ignites a prophetic war. A ruthless prince seeks to crush the prophecy that threatens his father’s rule. And an unlikely mother is forced into the center of a battle between power and destiny. This is the untold origin of a revolution—where faith is tested, courage is forged, and the forces of darkness fight to extinguish the light.
title: Zero A.D.

original_title: Yoshibyte's SpongeBob the Movie: Across The Multiverse
overview: The fate of the world rests in the hands of SpongeBob and Patrick in Yoshibyte's SpongeBob the Movie: Across the Multiverse.
title: Yoshibyte's SpongeBob the Movie: Across The Multiverse

overview: Those aren't dreams, he is real, and he is coming after him.
title: Noise: Reflejo

overview: A sick and sadistic Uber driver prowls the night looking for his next victims, but tonight, he may have found the one fare he wished he wouldn't have picked up.
title: Ride

overview: A story of the filmmaker Ollard and his wife Sophie.
title: Promises

overview: Young Gerda sets off into the great unknown in search of her friend Kai, who has mysteriously vanished.
title: North

overview: An experimental non-linear horror film portraying several surreal scenes of grotesque and violent acts
title: Faceless & Bound

overview: A methodical serial killer known as The Inferno Killer terrorizes the beautiful city of San Diego by murdering his victims according to the punishments within the 9 Circles of Hell.
title: Penance

original_title: Pinocchio and the Water of Life
overview: How do you save friends and defeat a dangerous villain, if you are just a small wooden boy? And what if, after gaining freedom, your friends don't know what to do with it now?
title: Pinocchio and the Water of Life

original_title: The Wizard Hunter: The Hunt for Evangelion Crowley
overview: A bounty hunter of lost masterpieces of any era, hired by a Swiss Art Collector is at the end of his tasks. But one last assignment will let him discover his hidden and dark legacy.
title: The Wizard Hunter: The Hunt for Evangelion Crowley

original_title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants
overview: SpongeBob travels to the depths of the ocean and faces off against the ghost of the Flying Dutchman.
title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants

overview: In the wake of the devastating war against the RDA and the loss of their eldest son, Jake Sully and Neytiri face a new threat on Pandora: the Ash People, a violent and power-hungry Na'vi tribe led by the ruthless Varang. Jake's family must fight for their survival and the future of Pandora in a conflict that pushes them to their emotional and physical limits.
title: Avatar: Fire and Ash

overview: When high school senior Julia brings her new friend Naya to a party, she’s quickly sidelined as Naya falls into the spotlight—forcing Julia to confront jealousy, betrayal, and a harrowing moment that changes everything.
title: Friend of the Year

overview: A coming of age drama about three different teen characters struggling to get by in their home town.  The first named Matthew is kicked out of his house and forced to find a job to support himself, the second named Noah is a hot shot basketball player who suffers an injury and can’t fulfill his scholarship to play on the college team, and the third named Eric is a party animal type who’s bad habits are leading him down a dark path that he may never get out of.
title: Mood Swings

original_title: Everybody Wants to go to The Party
overview: A man struggles to get into a party after learning another man with his name is already in attendance.
title: Everybody Wants to go to The Party

overview: An Asian representative shows up at a man's door to personally address a mildly racist tweet he posted. What starts as an awkward conversation slowly turns into something much stranger, and a lot more uncomfortable.
title: Chopsticks

overview: Aaron "Amadeus" Overlake is a visionary filmmaker revered for his genius but plagued by his own demons—a volatile alcoholic whose life is consumed by anger, controversy, and from a bitter heartbreak. As tabloids revel in his self-destruction, Aaron’s only anchor is his best friend, Santiago "Baron" Gonzalez, a charismatic actor fresh out of rehab, fighting to rebuild his career.  Bound by shared struggles and a tangled history, Aaron and Santiago navigate the toxic undercurrents of fame and friendship. As Aaron embarks on his next masterpiece, his chaotic life threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.
title: Prodigal Son

overview: An emerging noise rock band in the 2000s music scene of Providence, RI tries to secure a gig at a local, nationally renown warehouse venue. As tensions flare and stakes rise, they become embroiled in a battle with the venue's owner, the mafia, and a Lovecraftian cosmic horror.
title: Queen of the Rats

overview: An idealistic young politician juggles familial issues and a challenging work life while preparing to take over the job of her mentor, the state’s longtime incumbent governor.
title: Ella McCay

original_title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery
overview: World-renowned detective Benoit Blanc returns for his most dangerous case yet.
title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery

overview: A young boy witnesses the murder of his parents at the hands of a man dressed as Santa, only to grow up and become a killer himself. Haunted by trauma and fuelled by a twisted sense of justice, he dons the red suit, turning the advent calendar into a series of nights of terror. As Christmas Eve approaches, a small town becomes his latest hunting ground, where the naughty and bad pay the ultimate price.
title: Silent Night, Deadly Night

overview: When Max unknowingly summons a demon on Grindr, he must do whatever it takes to survive.
title: TAPS

overview: The magician Herr Drosselmeyer is on a quest to save his nephew. Hans-Peter has been transformed into a Nutcracker doll by the wicked Queen of the Mice; the only way to break the spell is for the Nutcracker to defeat the Mouse King and find a girl to love and care for him. A flicker of hope comes to Drosselmeyer in the form of the young Clara, whom Drosselmeyer meets at the Stahlbaum’s Christmas party. With a swish of Drosselmeyer’s cape and a little bit of magic, a cosy festive gathering turns into a marvellous adventure.
title: Royal Ballet & Opera 2025/26: The Nutcracker

overview: I hate the lies that brought me here, the illusions I once trusted. I tried to change what was never real, and now I carry the burden of my own delusion.

original_title: The Magnificent Raiders of Dimension War One
overview: A collection of rogues must gather information on a mysterious extra-dimensional threat to the galaxy in the 43rd century, and prepare a defense while fending off the first wave of attacks from horrific beings.
title: The Magnificent Raiders of Dimension War One

overview: A Documentary on the Filmmaker Ian Rintoul
title: A Single Frame

overview: A live recording of the 2024 Tony Award-winning Broadway revival of Stephen Sondheim and George Furth's musical, filmed at the Hudson Theatre in New York City. Franklin Shepard is a talented Broadway composer who abandons his theater career and all his friends in New York in order to produce films in Los Angeles. The story begins at the height of his Hollywood fame and moves backwards in time, showing snapshots of the most important moments in Frank’s life that shaped the man he is today.
title: Merrily We Roll Along

overview: Emi Thorn, the daughter of a notorious serial killer, finds herself trapped in a time loop, where she faces the horrific crimes of her father. The small, quiet town she once called home has become an endless battleground. Will she end up as her father's next victim, or is the truth way more complicated than the memories of her childhood?
title: Entropy

overview: The film follows Cass, a young woman who has resigned herself to a life of emotional invulnerability until she meets Virgil, a cartographer who makes maps to imaginary places. Along with his partner Malcolm, a vibrant renaissance man, the pair relentlessly attempts to travel back in time to awaken Cass to love again.
title: Eternal Return

overview: A customer is browsing a corner shop when finding someone steal inside. He then decides to follow him, and recover those possessions..
title: Thief!

overview: Anyone can survive five nights. This time, there will be no second chances.
title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2

overview: Claire Clauster organizes a special Christmas outing when her family forgets her in the shuffle. By the time they realize their mistake, she’s gone missing. Their Christmas is in jeopardy, but Claire has other plans.
title: Oh. What. Fun.

overview: When a man faking a leg injury meets a woman pretending to be pregnant, they strike an unusual connection founded on shared dysfunction and a reluctance to face their past.
title: Fracture

overview: Teenage boy Jake navigates his way through Secondary School in Glasgow and the violent culture. Jake becomes more and more involved in the fighting scene after being persuaded by his best friend Camron to fight a classmate in his school...
title: Grey Days

overview: Reeling from the murder of his wife, a man spirals into darkness and loses himself in the hunt for the killer.
title: Marion's Lilies

overview: Immersed in a daily life where actions repeat, and hours seem to dissolve, this animated film unveils the deep pain hidden within the crushing monotony of the work routine.
title: Millstone

overview: “ Eyes speak louder than words ” Doctor, can you please examine my eyes and tell me what they are screaming?
title: Bloody Holy

overview: The filmmakers behind Turtle Power return for another definitive deep dive into the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, focusing on how the Turtles evolved over time and adapted to new generations, yet retained the essence of what made them unique in the first place.
title: TMNT: Evolution, Mutation, and Reboot

overview: In Search of Darkness: 1995-1999 celebrates and explores the movies that defined the era: from Scream’s genre-shattering impact to J-Horror’s global emergence, from mind-bending twists to Y2K apocalyptic dread, and from blockbuster hits to straight-to-video gems.
title: In Search of Darkness: 1995-1999

overview: When a murderous mime starts a killing spree in a quiet neighborhood, an already injured teenager must survive his onslaught of terror.
title: The Mime

original_title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Last Straw
overview: The next installment in the animated Diary of a Wimpy Kid series.
title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Last Straw

overview: A modern neo-noir exploring the themes of love and friendship in an ever stratified world where human relationships are tested in the face of isolationism, technology and individualism.
title: Mirrors

overview: James comes home for the holidays with the intention of repairing the strained relationship with his daughter. Despite his attempt to mend things with a gift, his efforts are rejected, leading James to reluctantly toss the present in the trash. What follows is a series of mishaps, missteps, and misanthropic musings, tracing the discarded gift's journey as it returns to its rightful owner.
title: The Elephant's Present

original_title: How to Save the Immortal 2:  Elixer of Life
overview: Drybone the Immortal and Shieldmaiden Barbara are preparing for their wedding, but not all Barbara's relatives are happy about the union. Her strong-willed aunt, Queen Brungilda, believes her niece deserves a more suitable match. In a misguided attempt to stop the wedding, she unwittingly casts a powerful sleeping charm on Barbara. The Queen proclaims that the legendary Elixir of Life can save Barbara, but only a truly noble knight will survive the treacherous path to the Elixir, hidden in a perilous place where danger lurks at every turn. Drybone, known as a dark sorcerer, stands no chance in this noble quest, so he enlists Elijah, a true and valiant knight but clumsy and fearful, to join him. In a tale filled with action, magic, and humor, only a true hero can save Barbara and restore peace and joy to the kingdom.
title: How to Save the Immortal 2:  Elixer of Life

overview: Mia joins her friends for a high school graduation party to distract from an incoming asteroid expected to bring the inevitable end of the world.
title: Stargazed

overview: "Yaksha" tells the story of a spirit that haunts the remote areas of Jammu and Kashmir, protecting its own mysterious boundary. Many people have entered its territory, only to disappear without a trace, their stories lost forever.  The spirit, filled with anger and sorrow, keeps anyone from crossing the line it has set, claiming the lives of those who dare to approach. As more secrets are uncovered, the truth behind the unexplained deaths begins to unfold.
title: Yaksha

overview: A close-knit family is torn apart as a new movement known as "The Change" envelops the country.
title: Anniversary

overview: The lives of two siblings are completely upended when they discover a dead body, long buried in their parent’s basement, sending them down a rabbit hole of crime and murder.
title: Adulthood

overview: Agnes Shakespeare – the wife of the world's most famous writer – struggles to come to terms with the loss of her only son, Hamnet.
title: Hamnet

overview: The work of Belfast composer Neil Martin has been performed across the globe, from Ground Zero to Mostar Bridge, from the Royal Albert Hall to the International Space Station.
title: Neil Martin: Bóthar an Cheoil

overview: Detectives Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde find themselves on the twisting trail of a mysterious reptile who arrives in Zootopia and turns the mammal metropolis upside down.
title: Zootopia 2

overview: When a film crew go to an uncharted island, they meet island natives and a titanic ape named Kong.
title: The Day Monsters Roamed Earth

overview: Stuck at home and put to work by her spoiled Step-Sisters, Cinderella’s life is dreary and dull. Everything changes when she helps a mysterious woman out...  With a little bit of magic, she is transported into an ethereal new world – one where fairies bring the gifts of the seasons, where pumpkins turn into carriages, and where true love awaits.
title: Royal Ballet & Opera 2025/26: Cinderella

overview: The story explores the life of three Badjao brothers, Diether, Rakmel, and Agi, who beg on jeepneys. This documentary captures the difficult realities the siblings face every day in the bustling streets of Manila, where they are often unnoticed and ignored by society. By speaking out and supporting initiatives to alleviate inequity,  Angpao, diskarteng Badjao encourages viewers to acknowledge these problems and take action.
title: Angpao, diskarteng Badjao

overview: A small town legend returns from the dead to serve vengeance on Thanksgiving night.
title: Harvested 4

overview: A retired veteran finds transitioning into civilian life tough, when a woman with a big problem enters his RideShare begging the question, can you really escape fate?
title: Five Stars

overview: A horror film about a pilot who is the sole survivor of the plane crash in the deep unknown. He must survive in an isolated building where something evil is waiting.
title: Nightmare Hospital

overview: A young woman is locked in a toilet cubicle, drink spiked and at the mercy of the women around her.
title: Honey

overview: When a young hunter gets caught in a deadly blizzard up north, a stranger finds him and brings him to safety. When they return to the strangers deer camp, the hunter meets two other lost stragglers. As the night goes on, there seems to be more to these men than meets the eye.
title: The Deer Camp

overview: When a trio of scientists inadvertently launch a bio-attack on a busful of gorgeous women, sex-crazed zombies are created, wreaking havoc on a small town.
title: STZ

overview: The movie tells the biblical story of David — a warrior, poet, shepherd, and eventual king who lived his life for God.
title: David

overview: A young man manipulates an older woman with Alzheimers into believing he is her deceased husband.
title: Being Frank

overview: As an angry mob rises against the Wicked Witch, Glinda and Elphaba will need to come together one final time. With their singular friendship now the fulcrum of their futures, they will need to truly see each other, with honesty and empathy, if they are to change themselves, and all of Oz, for good.
title: Wicked: For Good

overview: In the midst of the Civil War, President Lincoln went to Gettysburg. "The Gettysburg Address" investigates the five extant copies of Lincoln's famous speech, separating fact from fiction along the way. Lincoln's greater journey to Gettysburg is chronicled, from his early anti-slavery sentiments as a poor farmer's son to his rousing orations as one of America's greatest leaders.
title: The Gettysburg Address

overview: When a hedonistic gang of punks take over the streets it's up to an ex Top Dog prisoner called Bulldozer to restore law and order. Until she meets the ring leader of the gang, a diabolical career criminal who knows her dark secret.
title: Throbbin' 84

overview: One year after the events of Season 1, a slate of fourteen new contestants were invited to the newly-renamed Camp Disventure to compete for a $1,000,000 grand prize. The contestants were divided into two competing teams of seven and pitted against each other in challenges, with the losing team required to vote someone out of the competition.
title: Disventure Camp 2

overview: A boy gets trapped in his house at night all alone as he starts losing himself in his thoughts and starts to understand the possibility of not being alone.
title: Indecipherable
